incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

components.name: System availability
components.description: Information about general system availability, such as server outages or performance issues.

incident_updates.body:
We had an issue with our public API. 

The Public API Gateway service was down, interrupting and causing failures on the API. The endpoints started to send 503 Service Unavailable errors beginning at 7:30 AM. The issue was resolved before usual business hours at 8:30 AM.
This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We are aware that some users experience login issues and a presented with a generic error. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information and apologize for any inconvenience this may be caused.

components.name: Email services
components.description: Information about email services such as reminders, notifications as well as in- and outbound recruiting messages.

incidents.name: Processing of updates may be delayed

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We have identified an issue that may lead to delayed processing of updates made in Personio. Not all changes are affected, and no updates will be lost — they may just take longer to be fully processed and correctly displayed.

components.name: System availability
components.description: Information about general system availability, such as server outages or performance issues.

incidents.name: Assigning public holiday calendars not processed

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Updates to holiday calendars during the time of the issue might be delayed but are not lost, as we are performing cleanup operations.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

We experience issues when assigning public holiday calendars to offices. The changes are not correctly processed, this may impact customers who change holiday calendars, potentially leading to incorrect absence and attendance balances.
